title: august 3: a new era begins: the world gets its first theme park
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the opening world’s first theme park, Santa Claus Land, and the ensuing history of everyone’s favorite overcrowded pastime. After, she reflects on the 2018 Travis Scott album, Astroworld. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: mxmtoon
